shared.invalidEmail: Seems like provided email is incorrect.
shared.passwordPattern: Password should consist of at least 8 characters including: at least one number, at least one regular and one capital letter.
shared.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Try again later.

cv.WIZUT: Software engineer, West Pomeranian University of Technology in Szczecin

ISPLMR.secondPart: , developing web apps in MEAN stack for medical centrum to handle online and offline patients. Managing and creating electronic medical documentation, reservations, schedules, payments. Three applications for patients, doctors and managing. Integrations with external systems via REST API and SOAP. Backend based on microservices writed with Node using TypeScript. Frontend with Angular with abstraction of frequently used elements into libraries. Work of our team is available on a
ISPLMR.fourthPart: for patients on which I was responsible for about 75% frontend work. Working remotely in a small team.
